messages.message:
<!here>
Release sandboxes are largely broken right now.
• 24.01 is failing to properly hibernate/revive (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CCY413CSU/p1712331681128859). Might be stable again after current deploy, but I'm not confident.
• 23.10 is timing out on deploy as well, though I haven't confirmed why just yet.
• 23.01 is broken on `celery-core-tasks` due to a failing import (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CCY413CSU/p1712333723498189)
• 23.07 hasn't worked for days, most recently because it spins for an hour on ??? (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CCY413CSU/p1712324958793839) and then fails with a 404.
Blasting here because I don't have a great feel for who owns what or who should be contacted when and where. Donagh and Arkadiusz have jumped in on 24.01 and maybe 23.10 if it's the same failure case, but the others... :man-shrugging::skin-tone-3:
(Seeing as I’m infra-on-call that might not do much :joy: )
Heh all good, mostly I wanted to indicate why I didn’t do that first :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:
@jtau @Aaron Tami can you please prioritize looking at these?
Yup ill look at these this afternoon.
